markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Chattering Jaws](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2027)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Chattering jaws usually serve no purpose other unnerving people by clicking their teeth together. Some chattering jaws only chatter at regular intervals to help tell the time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/AnimatedBones_ChatteringJaws.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Chattering Jaws](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2027)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +3; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Incessant Chattering** jaws always chatter at a predetermined time, such as during specific times of day or in response to a trigger, such as noticing a creature within 30 feet. During these times, the chattering jaws can be automatically heard by all creatures within 60 feet.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 8

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), fatigued, [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 2, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 2, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 2, piercing 2, slashing 2

**Gnashing Rage** When chattering jaws are destroyed, all other animated bones within 30 feet that can see or hear the chattering jaws become [quickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 1 minute. The animated bones can use this extra action to Stride or Strike.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8,
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-317" />
name: Chattering Jaws
